title: Berlin: (1) The Lustgarten from Foot of Steps up to the Museum: Marienkirche, Domkirche, North Façade of the Schloss and Granite Basin in front of the Museum; (2) Inscription in Front of the Museum; (3) Three Bays of the North Façade of the Schloss
credits: Accepted by the nation as part of the Turner Bequest 1856
